extendedInfo.description: Big Digital Clock is the perfect desk or nightstand companion! Fully customizable display lets you change font, color and background to suit your taste. Font is inflated to find the largest possible display for your device.This is our first app ever! Please let us know what we can do to make it perfect for you!

reviews.title: Good & simple
reviews.comment: No unnecessary permissions. Very useful in it\'s simplicity. Would be great if you expanded a version to incorporate simple alarm/snooze function.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Top notch!
reviews.comment: Excellent. Does the job as promised. Small footprint and big clock face! Two suggestions. Change the icon as it seems like a clock telling time and try to move to sd. Thx.
reviews.author: Charles Zorn

reviews.title: PERFECT
reviews.comment: I was looking for an easy-to-read (big) digital clock that could also serve as a soft night light on the bedside table when the phone is plugged in. \"Big Digital Clock\" does that perfectly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Burns screen
reviews.comment: Works well but be careful.  Burnt the numbers right into my s3 the first night. Now i have the numbers light grey...
reviews.author: A Flex

reviews.comment: Lights shut off fine on cyan 6.1 rc1 dream. Would be better with more options like \"digital clock\" has such as brightness control, etc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Been looking for a simple clock app like this for my desk forever. This works perfectly. Would be 5* if date and pm display were options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: I like it how it takes up all the screen and LCD is big. But it to bright. Needs a brightness option and make it to switch off the light buttons. Sony Xperia Z
reviews.author: David Tee

reviews.title: Like it
reviews.comment: Great app! But when the OS updated recently the text is too big and truncates to the next line. Visible in portrait, but partially off screen in landscape.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app...
reviews.comment: Great App.....best clock out there.  Can see it great at night w/o my glasses.  Works well on my Thunderbolt.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great night clock
reviews.comment: The only way they could improve this app would be to turn off the button lights
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This clock doesn\'t cover the whole screen .. it cuts off the clock n both landscape and portrait!! It would be great if not for that! (Evo)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 5 stars if you could get it to shut off the lights on the home/menu/back/search buttons! Droid Incredible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A Favorite App
reviews.comment: Use constantly, put my phone on airplane mode, tilt horizontally and screen stays lit. Barely uses battery and becomes handy clock when I need one. Love the customizable color. Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great on my sam galaxy s. Solved bright night light by using a darker color. Can now just see the time without lighting up the room. GREAT APP!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 5 stars when able to switch off button back lights on froyo. Otherwise, it\'s great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but needs date
reviews.comment: Please add option for date .... then five stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good so far
reviews.comment: We will see I will be back to change my review. It its good then I will give two more and if its not then only one. So far seems to do the job. Nice and bright.
reviews.author: Joseph Chalky

reviews.title: Handy
reviews.comment: Comes in incredibly handy twice a day, every day. Many thanks. Epic 4g.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Installed this on Archos 70. Every font works great except digital. Would be REALLY cool if this linked to alarm! Good app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I find this useful. I have the phone synced to atomic time and can then carry this larger clock display to set other clocks which cannot be synchronized. I like that it will keep the screen on. I wish the font could be chosen or adjusted to better fill the screen. It\'s big but not full for me. ATRIX 4G.
reviews.author: A Google User
